Thus, upon receipt of your agreement, we will create the selection for you and deliver it to you.

The Pinakes database contains information such as contact details of political representatives, senior civil servants and decision-makers from Belgian, Luxembourg and European public administrations as well as from services and organizations in the welfare, health and of the non-market. Public administrations, institutions and legal entities governed by private law can thus inform data subjects of activities, products or services that may be of interest to them. We also process data for other purposes. We would like to point out that the processing of data is done in accordance with the legislation relating to the respect of privacy as well as the legislation relating to e-commerce in force. If you would like more information about how we process personal data, please see our Privacy Statement. If you have any questions or remarks, do not hesitate to contact our DPO via dpo@pinakes.be or at the address; Boulevard de l'Empereur 34, 1000 Brussels.
